des: "A quick way to make crispy home fries. Great for breakfast or as a side dish.  Potatoes may be shredded and cooked in the same manner for crispy hash browns."
ins: Rinse potato cubes with cold water, and drain well. Melt butter or margarine in a large skillet over medium heat. Place potatoes in the skillet, and stir to coat with butter. Season with salt and pepper. Cover with a lid, and cook for 10 minutes. Remove the lid, and cook for another 10 minutes, turning frequently until brown and crisp on all sides..
